item.title: Discover the Secret to Turning Off Video Calls on Facebook Messenger App for iPhone!
item.description: I. Introduction Facebook Messenger is an incredibly popular messaging app for iPhone users. It allows you to quickly and easily communicate with friends, family, and colleagues. But one feature of the app that many users find annoying is the ability to make video calls. If you’re looking for a way to turn off video calls on the Facebook Messenger app for iPhone, you’ve come to the right place. II. Advantages of Turning Off Video Calls on Facebook Messenger App for iPhone Turning off video calls on Facebook Messenger for iPhone can be beneficial for a few reasons.
